section.p: The simple observation entry is meant to be an abstract representation of many of the observations used in this specification. It can be made concrete by the specification of a few additional constraints, namely the vocabulary used for codes, and the value representation. A simple observation may also inherit constraints from other specifications (e.g., ASTM/HL7 Continuity of Care Document).

ol.li: SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08)
SHALL conform to CDA Clinical Statement
[CDA] Contains [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClassObservation
[CDA] Contains [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
[CDA] Contains [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
[IHE] SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08)
